name: OPANARCHY
description: We are developing humanoid robots integrated within a decentralized, blockchain enabled network architecture that ensures secure, trustless communication and collaboration. Opanarchy is creating a comprehensive ecosystem for humanoid robotics development, bringing together developers, hardware, and community. we also building an open markertplace for robotics hardware and software along wirh private community forum for our community to hash out ideas, swap feedback, and keep the conversation flowing.
